name: Final Yaldi
description:
Final Yaldi is a prototype for a deck-building roguelike game -- yes, one of those.

If you like those, here's what's different about this one:

  • Your opponent also plays with cards, and they have a plan of moves each turn, which you must respond to.
  • You connect your cards to each other to organise a plan of attack. Cards can affect each other.
  • There is no mana or energy, cards have lifetime. Lifetime is consumed every time a card is played, and then the card is discarded.

It may come back in the future as a different game - who knows?
